Me? well I think a good scenario is one with alot of challenge, Of course if
it is too challenging, it may prove to be a bad thing, a good balance of
challenge, theme and fun, and maybe a chance of the scenario going somewhere
will make the scenario worthwhile, I play everquest online, and they always
have special events that are challenging but play a role in a much bigger
event that happens.  So keep all this in mind when making a scenario.  All
my scenarios are bugged and i'm working to fix them now.

								The Legendary Light

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Paul Hightower [mailto:dph_of_rules@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 16, 2001 9:23 AM
To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [gladiator] What makes a good scenario


Ok, time to attempt to jump start the list again.

What makes a good/bad scenario?  I have my own ideas, but I will wait
for responses to post my ideas.  Please site examples, but include
scenario # and where the scenario is located if it is not part of the
built-in scenarios.

Yes, I am going somewhere with this topic.
